Skill DMG Dealt +20% (for every skill). When the wielder's battle skill applies Cryo Infliction, the wielder gains Cryo DMG Dealt +10% for 15.00s. When the wielder deals combo skill DMG to an enemy with Cryo Infliction, the wielder gains Cryo DMG Dealt +20% for 15.00s. The two effects apply separately and do not stack with themselves.
